__e: I can literally see the curvature of the earth from here.

When he came back and talked about what it was like... to see the curve of the Earth and the black sky above... I knew that we would have a great business... and there would be literally millions of people... out there in the world who wanted to participate... in Space Adventures experiences.
I know what I said, but based on the curvature of the wound and the injuries to her neck, our victim was stabbed with a sword. - A sword?
We can give you warp eight if we need it.
I want warp eight in five hours. I don't want to hear your excuses.
That's difficult enough when both ships are traveling at warp. The Kazon ship's not even moving.
We haven't needed to freeze anyone since we developed warp capability, which explains the most interesting thing about our friend here.
All the other ships are out of warp, sir, and have arrived at Vulcan, but we seem to have lost all contact.
- We are at warp six, on course.
We are ready to attempt a controlled overload jump to warp six.
At warp six, we should be there in 1 6 hours.
